member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AdvancedDoorDefinition.Opening.MaxOpen
member.summary: For Sliding Parts = value in meter For Rotating Parts = value in Degrees

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AdvancedDoorDefinition.Opening.PivotPosition
member.summary: override the Pivot/Hinge for this opening will be read from Model if not defined

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AdvancedDoorDefinition.SubpartDefinition.Name
member.summary: Name of the Subpart Model without extension i.e.: "DoorLeft" will be "path/to/model/DoorLeft.mwm"

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AdvancedDoorDefinition.SubpartDefinition.PivotPosition
member.summary: define the Pivot/Hinge position for this Subpart will be read from Model if not defined

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxDistanceSmallGrid
member.summary: Distance from direct line between two waypoints, at which will the autopilot try to correct with CourseCorrectionMaxThrust% thrust. Small grid only setting

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxDistanceLargeGrid
member.summary: Distance from direct line between two waypoints, at which will the autopilot try to correct with CourseCorrectionMaxThrust% thrust. Large grid only setting

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxThrustPercentage
member.summary: Max percentage of thrust dedicated to correcting course toward nearest point on direct line between two traveled points

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxRemainingRotationBeforeThrust
member.summary: Max angle in radians between vectors 'Grid.Forward' and 'NextWaypoint.Forward' or 'Grid.Position - NextWaypoint.Position' when going toward first waypoint before starting thrust

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxRemainingRotationBeforeThrustInPrecisionMode
member.summary: Max angle in radians between vectors 'Grid.Forward' and 'NextWaypoint.Forward' or 'Grid.Position - NextWaypoint.Position' when going toward first waypoint before starting thrust. In Precision mode

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.CourseCorrectionMaxDistanceInPrecisionModeGridSizeMultiple
member.summary: Distance from direct line between two waypoints (in multiples of gridSize), at which will the autopilot try to correct with CourseCorrectionMaxThrust% thrust in precision mode

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.RotationDeadzone
member.summary: How many radians remaining to be considered fully rotated

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.RotationDeadzoneAdaptiveSpeed
member.summary: How many radians remaining to be considered fully rotated. For adaptive speed waypoints

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MinRotationSpeed
member.summary: Minimum rotation speed (vanila was about 0.05)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MaxRotationSpeed
member.summary: Minimum rotation speed (vanila was about 1.8)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MinRotationSpeedThresholdRadians
member.summary: Under this value rotation speed will always be MinRotationSpeed (vanila was 0)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MaxRotationSpeedTresholdRadians
member.summary: Above this value rotation speed will always be MaxRotationSpeed (vanila was infinite)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.PrecisionModeRotationVelocitySlowFactor
member.summary: Rotation velocity in precision mode is divided by this value

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.RotationVelocitySlowFactorAutomaticBehavior
member.summary: Rotation velocity is divided by this value

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.RotationVelocitySlowFactorAutomaticBehaviorTreshold
member.summary: Treshold under which grids with AutomaticBehavior (like drones) and target, will divide their torque by RotationVelocitySlowFactorAutomaticBehavior

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MaxPitchAngleDeg
member.summary: When moving to a waypoint in P-Gravity, the grid may pitch up or down by this angle in degrees

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.DefaultPitchAngleDeg
member.summary: Default value of MaxPitchAngle in degrees for newly built block

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.MaxRollAngleDeg
member.summary: When moving to a waypoint in P-Gravity, the grid may roll left or right by this angle in degrees

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_AutopilotComponentDefinition.DefaultRollAngleDeg
member.summary: Default value of MaxRollAngle in degrees for newly built block

member.name: F:Sandbox.Common.ObjectBuilders.Definitions.MyObjectBuilder_OxygenContainerObject.OxygenLevel
member.summary: This is not synced automatically Call SyncOxygenContainerLevel on inventory to sync it
